title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127 (not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items below the label move down.
EB: The close button in the Navigator view should remain in its original position when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Navigator view on Linux using build 20011127. 
2. Resize the view to make it smaller. 
3. Observe that the tool items below the label move down, including the close button.
